General.Name: Aega ASA
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Aega ASA, an investment company, focuses on solar power and renewable energy industries. As of April 27, 2023, it owned and operated nine solar parks located in Italy, with a combined production capacity of approximately 8.4 GWh per year. The company was formerly known as Nordic Financials ASA and changed its name to Aega ASA in January 2016. Aega ASA was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.
